rules.text: WATERFALL! {player1} starts drinking. Going clockwise, each person starts when the person before them starts. You can only stop when the person before you stops.
HEAVEN! Last person to point to the ceiling drinks.
FLOOR! Last person to touch the floor drinks.
VIKING! {player1} puts fingers on their head like horns. Neighbors paddle. Last to react drinks.
SOCIABLES! Everyone cheers and drinks together.
NOSE GOES! Last person to touch their nose drinks.
SHOTGUN! Everyone finishes their drink. Last one done drinks an extra shot.

challenges.text: {player1}, pick your poison: truth or 3 drinks?
{player1} and {player2}: thumb war! Loser takes a shot.
Rhyme time! {player1} says a word, go around rhyming. First to fail drinks.
{player1} makes a rule. It lasts until someone else draws this card. Breaking the rule = drink.
STARING CONTEST! {player1} vs {player2}. First to blink finishes their drink.
Categories! {player1} picks a category. Go around naming things. Repeat or hesitate = drink.
{player1}, drink for every person you've kissed in this room. We're watching.
Medusa! On 3, everyone looks up. If you lock eyes with someone, both drink.
{player1}, you're now Question Master. Anyone who answers your questions drinks until dethroned.
{player1}, you're now Thumb Master. When you put your thumb on the table, everyone follows. Last one drinks.
Drink if your last relationship ended via text.
Arm wrestle! {player1} vs {player2}. Loser finishes their drink, winner gives out 3.
Flip cup challenge! {player1} vs {player2}. Loser takes a shot.
Pick a mate! {player1} picks someone. They drink every time you drink for the rest of the game.
{player1}, give out drinks equal to the number of dating apps on your phone.

neverHaveIEver.text: Never have I ever hooked up with someone I met that night. Drink if you have.
Never have I ever sent a text I immediately regretted. Drink up, we all have.
Never have I ever stalked an ex while drunk. Liars drink double.
Never have I ever faked a sick day for fun. Drink if guilty.
Never have I ever drunkenly told someone I loved them. Drink and explain.
Never have I ever woken up somewhere with no idea how I got there. Drink.
Never have I ever double-texted after midnight. Drink and show us.
Never have I ever lied about my body count. Drink if lying right now.
Never have I ever cried in an Uber. Drink if you've been there.
Never have I ever hooked up with a coworker. HR would like a word. Drink.
Never have I ever slid into someone's DMs successfully. Drink if you have game.
Never have I ever blocked someone then unblocked them to check their profile. Drink.
Never have I ever pretended to be drunker than I was. Method actors drink.
Never have I ever caught feelings for a one-night stand. Romantics drink.
Never have I ever blamed alcohol for something I 100% meant to do. Drink honestly.

mostLikelyTo.text: Point to who's most likely to black out tonight. That person starts a waterfall.
Point to who's most likely to text their ex tonight. That person shows their last ex conversation or drinks 5.
Point to who's most likely to start drama. That person gives out 5 drinks to prove it.
Point to who's most likely to disappear without saying goodbye. They drink for the audacity.
Point to who's most likely to end up in someone's bed tonight. They drink with confidence.
Point to who's most likely to get into a fight defending a friend. Noble drinkers.
Point to who's most likely to order 4am food. They buy the next round.
Point to who's most likely to give unsolicited advice. They give out 3 drinks of wisdom.
Point to who's most likely to overshare when drunk. They start oversharing or drink 4.
Point to who's most likely to wake up with regrets tomorrow. They take a preventive shot.
